ygData.subject: Re: Hardware question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I stack 3 whenever I fight unless lag prevents me, rare but happens sometimes. ... I am using a p233mmx, 128 EDO Ram, I think 12 meg of SDRam on the video
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Webber, Jessica" <WebberJ@...>
>
>Question for anyone here who can successfully stack 3 or 4 songs in crowded
>zones:


I stack 3 whenever I fight unless lag prevents me, rare but happens
sometimes.

>What are you using for hardware? (processor, ram, video ram, free
>DASD/virtual mem - whichever is smaller, modem, typical connect speed,
>anything else I may be forgetting) I know I could use a bit of a hardware
>upgrade, just wondering how little I can get away with. Also, what in-game
>sacrifices have you made in the options to be able to weave/mix/twist so
>successfully?


I am using a p233mmx, 128 EDO Ram, I think 12 meg of SDRam on the video
card, Diamond Monster 3d2 Voodoo2 card, I dont let windows manage my virtual
memory if that is what you mean, and I am running a fairly clean install of
win95. I have seen my friend running an almost identical system to me,
(Only 64 meg of SD ram) and he was running very poorly in some areas I have
no problems with. I also turn off partical density which makes it worlds
better. I also try to make certain I am running the most up to date drivers
for everything as well. I can stack 3 songs in the bank in freeport even
when it is crowded if I want.
-Sprite
